intro: Turn stacks of chaos into spotless profit. Count it, clean it, cash it out.
description:
Ever wondered what it takes to clean and move dirty money? In Cash Laundry Simulator, you step into a high-risk, hands-on world where precision and speed decide your success. From detecting counterfeits to packaging stacks for delivery, every detail matters. Will you master the art of laundering and build a reputation for flawless work?

Key Features:
- Money Mechanics – Carry, collect, and bundle bills with tape, then slice them open with a knife when needed.
-  Authenticity Check – Use counting machines to sort bills by denomination and UV scanners to expose fakes or duplicates.
-  Wash & Dry – Run cash through washing machines and dryers to clean and restore it before shipping.
- Order System – Track assignments on your tablet, sort bills into three different box types, and send them off via conveyor.
- Collectible Bills – Rare notes can be pinned to your collection board, unlocking trophies and bragging rights.
- Dynamic Drops – Watch bills rain down from pipes, falling as singles or filling up boxes for you to process.
 
Money may be dirty, but in Cash Laundry Simulator it’s your job to make it shine. Take on orders, outsmart counterfeits, and rise as the ultimate money-cleaning expert. Are you ready to roll up your sleeves and keep the cash flowing?
